name: The 4th Estate Mask A.K.A. HACKATAO #REMIXME - by Apocalypse Pictures
description:
The most iconic submitted project for the 2nd edition of Hackatao Remixme.

A spectre is haunting metaverse: the spectre of Hackatao.

The Fourth Estate depicts a NFT workers' strike MASK
 
This social question imposes. 

Many are dedicated to it, and study it, swiftly to resolve it. 

Even art should not be alienated from this metaverse to a destination that is still unknown, but which is understood to be better than the present conditional.

Apocalypse 2021

Technique used: Digital Drawing, Compositing, Post production, 3D space simulation, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Collage
